CustomField.description: Shows the Ultimate Parent within the Account Hierarchy. For example even if something is 2+ levels down in the hierarchy so that its parent Account isnt the top level parent, it with show through this relationship who the top level parent is.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Top-Level Parent in the Account Hierarchy. You can think of it as the Parent's Parent's Parent. OR Great Great Grandparent.
CustomField.label: x-Ultimate Parent
